No worries fuzzy we all started sometime, if you are using cfg usbloader click on the game so that you see the options for it, click options and close to the bottom you will see ios, change that to 248 or 249 and it should boot just fine.

have you tried reloading it onto your hd?

For all PAL(german, french) wiis who freeze(white screen) after the press 2 startmenue was in japanese.
Just change your wii system language setting to english and it should work.
